original_title: Protect me from what I want
overview: As the 1980s reached its frantic climax, Jenny Holzer was the worldâ€™s most celebrated artist, with 3 solo shows in 1989: the Dia Art Foundation, the Guggenheim Museum, and The Venice Biennale, where she was the first woman to represent the United States and where she was awarded first prize for the most outstanding pavilion.
title: Protect me from what I want
